idea.heading: The platform vision in action
idea.left: We connect families to nearby educational options with clear guidance, curated insights, and the confidence that each choice is informed by real needs.
idea.right: Our experience is designed to remove noise: consistent program details, transparent comparisons, and pathways that adapt to the way parents actually decide.

guidance.text: Follow step-by-step cues that keep decisions simple and on track.

support.heading: Clarity that supports every decision
